mapper.insert: insert into Repair (start_date, VIN, odometer_reading, customer_id, service_writer_user_name, description ) values(now(), #{VIN}, #{odometer_reading}, #{customer_id}, #{service_writer_user_name}, #{description})
mapper.update:
update Repair
label_charge = #{label_charge},
description = #{description}
where VIN = #{VIN} and complete_date is null
update Repair set complete_date = now() where VIN = #{VIN} and complete_date is null
mapper.insert: insert into Part (start_date, VIN, vendor_name, part_name, unit_price, quantity) values(#{start_date}, #{VIN}, #{vendor_name}, #{part_name}, #{unit_price}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: select * from Part where start_date = #{start_date} and VIN = #{VIN} and vendor_name = #{vendor_name} and part_name = #{part_name}
select * from Repair where VIN = #{VIN} and complete_date is not null
select a.part_cost from (select sum(unit_price * quantity) as part_cost, start_date, VIN from Part group by start_date, VIN) a where a.start_date = #{start_date} and a.VIN = #{VIN}
